intro: Share your story with NiNa! ðŸ’« NiNa's shop has a wide variety of magical items, and she'd love to help you find the perfect one for your journey. Feel free to reach out HERE for a free consultation and discover what resonates best with your energy! âœ¨ðŸ’–

lilith.name: Lilith Candle
lilith.desc: A rare, powerful candle embodying Goddess Lilith symbol of perfection, intelligence, strength, and allure.

hekate.name: Hekate Candle
hekate.desc: This candle is lit on special occasions in the annual "witch's calendar."

medusa.name: Medusa Candle
medusa.desc: The most powerful magical candle from Ninawitch, invoking mighty gods and goddesses.

phoenix.name: Phoenix Candle
phoenix.desc: This ritual frees you from the old, making space for growth, creativity, and strength.

gaia.name: Gaia Candle
gaia.desc: Connect with Goddess Gaia's powerful energy days to write and speak your wishes.

angel.name: Lighting Angel Candle
angel.desc: Angel Wish Candle doubles the power of a Potion, serving as a direct prayer to your Higher Self and guardian angels.

aphrodite.name: Aphrodite Candle
aphrodite.desc: Ritual Aphrodite is a sacred ritual I personally light for you, carrying the love and allure of Goddess Aphrodite.

wish.name: Wish candle burning
wish.desc: True witcher performs a candle ritual to quickly activate your short-term wishes.

pandora.name: Pandora Candle
pandora.desc: Twice as powerful as the Medusa Candle for beauty, wisdom, attraction, and inner strength.

bastet.name: Bastet Candle
bastet.desc: Bastet Candle radiates powerful protection and luck, twice as strong as Medusa Candle.
